long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The BBI Quote Tool is a powerful extension for freight brokers and logistics professionals that streamlines the process of obtaining rate predictions and market analysis for freight loads.

Key Features:
- Quick Analysis: Select text containing load details from any webpage and press Ctrl+Q (Cmd+Q on Mac) to instantly parse the information
- Smart Parsing: Automatically extracts pickup/delivery locations and equipment type from selected text
- Comprehensive Rate Data: Analyzes historical trends from over 10,000 loads per day
- Multiple Price Sources: Access DAT market rates, machine learning predictions, and historical-based predictions in one view
- PC*Miler Integration: Industry-standard mileage calculations for accurate per-mile rates
- Market Insights: View detailed market conditions, confidence scores, and rate trends
- Bulk Analysis: Upload multiple loads for batch rate predictions
- Flexible Input: Enter locations using either ZIP codes or City/State combinations

Note: This extension requires an active BBI account to access rate predictions and market analysis features.
